summary.paragraph: Cross-stack engineer with 10+ years of experience, focusing on constructing distributed systems. Adept at task assessment, team-building, and implementing scalable solutions. Enthusiastic and dedicated professional, continuously seeking innovative approaches.

skills.title: Scala / Java (Back-End)
bullets: Having commercial experience as a developer and team lead, strong advocacy for functional programming, emphasizing simplicity and minimalism.

Successfully transitioned 7 projects and initiated 6 new projects within the ZIO and Arrow ecosystem, resulting in enhanced code clarity, boosted performance efficiency, and increased execution stability.
Leveraged Akka to design and implement an intricate microservices architecture encompassing service discovery, configuration management, load balancing, and fault tolerance.
Achieved sub-millisecond performance using Netty, Aeron, CassandraDB to handle over 60,000 active sessions.
Architected a high-performance transport system using GraphQL/Protobuf (gRPC)/Apache Avro across Web, Mobile, and IoT stacks for superior performance and declarative documentation.

experience.company_desc: Leading retail company specializing in electronics and household appliances.
bullets: Led the development of a new product from scratch, integrating 40,000 stores and 160,000 users into a unified platform.
Designed and implemented features to manage and distribute bonuses, track user performance, and display KPI results.
Architected a scalable backend system to handle large volumes of data efficiently, ensuring real-time processing and reporting.
Successfully integrated data from the SAP system, handling complex data migration and synchronization tasks.
Integrated various third-party services and APIs to enhance the platform's functionality and ensure smooth data synchronization.
Conducted extensive performance testing and optimization to guarantee system reliability and responsiveness.
experience.technologies: Scala, Java, PostgreSQL, Docker, REST API, Kubernetes (k8s), SAP

experience.company_desc: Full-stack esports and online gambling company fueled by video gaming growth.
bullets: Drove development of an advanced gambling platform, elevating the prototype to production and ensuring compliance.
Minimized incidents at launch and reduced the number of support calls.
Reduced user registration time from 10 minutes to 1 minute through UX structure improvements.
Proposed infrastructure elements that lowered maintenance costs and improved ease of change.
Built a fraud-prevention ML model with over 90% registration detection and cut downtime by half.
Improved processing time from 2.5 seconds to 30 ms by implementing a distributed load balancer.

experience.company_desc: Popular messenger in the UAE and super app for rentals, food, and tickets.
bullets: Modified high-load messenger services and designed infrastructure for managing data and module interactions.
Orchestrated architecture for 100,000+ users, enabling 5 instances while increasing performance via RAM usage.
Built SOA integration for the super-app, cutting integration development time from 1 month to 1.5 weeks.
Selected and mentored new team members and coordinated essential job documentation.
Researched and integrated a distributed cloud architecture, increasing scalability by 40% and reducing costs by 50%.

experience.company_desc: Viral messenger in the UAE with automatic message translation features.
bullets: Modeled critical application modules, consulted on development, and built data transport for high-load microservices.
Lowered latency from 500 ms to 59 ms through low-level optimization.
Influenced scaling architecture and optimized the project budget by 3 months, sustaining 56,000 users per day.
Built a high-load request model, reducing bottlenecks by 50% and improving performance visualization.
Optimized cloud architecture with on-prem tooling, improving response time by 100 ms and reducing server usage 10x.
Reverse-engineered Telegram's MTProto protocol and implemented backend features for multiple device targets.
Delivered 95% of Telegram's general functionality in the platform.
Designed architecture serving 15,000 daily active users on a single server.

experience.company_desc: SaaS for incorporation C-corp and LLC with bank integration.
bullets: Built an encrypted messaging tunnel to banks for KYC application transfers.
Built a system processing up to 500 incorporation requests per day.
Recruited and mentored a team of 7 developers, increasing completion speed by 35%.
Authored a fraud detection system reducing document validation time from 2 hours to 5 minutes.
experience.technologies: Kotlin, Java, Spring, Spark, Thrift, Kafka, PostgreSQL

experience.company_desc: Workflow management platform for describing daily activities and automating routine tasks.
bullets: Researched market opportunities, increasing potential revenue by 30% and forming strategic partnerships.
Produced a prototype, built a marketing strategy, and identified key promotion channels.
Defined a feedback process and ran a fast agile development cycle.
Completed a startup accelerator program and won Best SaaS Award with a $10,000 grant.
